attributes.action: stop fuel companies charging prepay meter customers more for fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prepay meter customers pay on average £173 more a year for gas and £113 a year more for electricity.  Prepay meters enable those on low incomes to budget, however they end up paying more than a standard quarterly billed consumer.  This should not be allowed and ask the Prime Minister to stop fuel companies penalising those on lower incomes and stop this overcharging.
